entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • the query can not be translated, nested model filtering #29370
  • Optimize date/time member comparison translation to use indexes #29368
  • Returns wrong count of a ICollection<T> with Include #29367

Closed

  • ValueGenerator Creating Empty Guid #25502
  • Include filter information is lost after Select method #28141
  • groupby with a comparator #28138
  • How do I call a function each time entity is populated with data #28136
  • Command Timeout doesn't set sqlite3_busy_timeout #28135
  • EF Core 6 - Unable to translate a collection subquery in a projection #28130
  • Strict mode tables not working, syntax error #28124
  • 'OnConfiguring' cannot be used to modify DbContextOptions when DbContext pooling is enabled. #28123
  • SetBeforeSaveBehavior(PropertySaveBehavior.Ignore) not working when inserting parent with child entity with automatic linking #28122
  • DefaultIfEmpty() unsupported in subquery when main query has group by? #28119
  • No-Relational Provider #28114
  • dotnet ef migrations bundle build fails when there is more than one project file #28113
  • Is there any way to add key annotations in cs files generated from Grpc proto files? #28112
  • How to add a custom MemberTranslator for DateOnly #28111
  • EF Core fails to track property if it's set up as JSON #28109
  • Entity framework .net6 generating wrong queries with old column names that don't exist anymore #28107
  • EF Core migration alters field lengths in unrelated AspNet tables #28106
  • `dotnet-ef migrations add` starts entire application when CreateHostBuilder method is not present #28105
  • SQLite Query: Consider translating Sum to TOTAL #28101
  • SQLite Query: Translate string.Join and Concat #28100
  • .Where method cannot translate expression tree, despite the expression being correct #28095
  • Not null sql column with -1 default value #28094
  • NavigationBaseIncludeIgnored exception raised when a class and its navigational property are of the same type. #28093
  • dotnet ef Failed to load /snap/dotnet-sdk/168/shared/Microsoft.NETCore.App/6.0.5/libcoreclr.so (using Ubuntu 22.04 LTS) #28089
  • Cannot bind constructor parameter to the property even though their type and name matches (except in casing) #28088
  • Environment-specific Data Seeding #28082
  • Is RetriesOnFailure on the IExecutionStrategy interface poorly named or even misleading? #28079
  • Why Ef Core MinLength constraint has no effect on database configuration? #28076
  • EF Core 5.0 : Add or remove ValueGeneratedNever in IEntityTypeConfiguration does not change anything when update existing sql server database #28075
  • Many-to-many UsingEntity with custom join object #28074
  • EF Core 6 fails to detect specified discriminator #28069
  • Using DbCommand with TransactionScope on an open connection does not create an active transaction. #28066
  • ReplaceService on AddDbContext doesn't work at design time, but it does in OnConfiguring #28060
  • Problem with many-to-many with composite key on one side needing to rename SQL columns #28055
  • Query Does Not Return Included Entity After Execution #28053
  • Invalid column enum name on update database #28050
  • Subclassing DbContext Duplicates Migration Changes #28049
  • Receiving: "System.NotSupportedException : Collection was of a fixed size." when not using a fixed-size collection. #28047
  • MissingMethod on CreateModel: 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IColumnMapping> Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IColumn.get_PropertyMappings()' #28042
  • Using custom entity Id type results in blocking select query without any error #28040
  • Simple projection "cannot be translated" #28038
  • Error when try to configure optional owned entity with nested required owned entity #28030
  • Possible bug with relations loading (foreign key) #28029
  • Cosmos Db First query always shows very slow performance compared to subsequent queries. #28027
  • Nesting `DbContext` scopes breaks filtering semantics on queries on the outer context #28025
  • DatabaseGeneratedOption.Identity not working on Guid property #28024
  • New to Add-Migration, can't get it to work #28022
  • Development of the Include Delegate #28021
  • Cosmosdb filtering against list of sub-object is not working #28016
  • TPC scenario not supported #28015
  • Calling user defined function cosmos #28014
  • How to properly reconfigure model? #28013
  • How do I convert DbContextOptions<DbContextB> to DbContextOptions<DbContextA> ? #28012
  • Read-only transaction support #28003
  • can provide a method for obtaining query parameters? #28001
  • How can I see what issues are fixed in a release? #28000
  • Using EXECUTE AS USER puts session in kill state #27999
  • Initial migration creating shadow properties following documentation to add navigation properties to Identity. #27992
  • Any way to set default `JsonSerializerOptions`? #27991
  • Caching query result for the lifetime of DbContext #27989
  • How to load vfs extensions in Microsoft.Data.Sqlite? #27986
  • Runtime error on string.StartsWith, string.EndsWith string.Contains in lambda search filter with StringComparison #27983
  • How to specify which SQL Server DbContext constructor to use in ASP.NET Core dependency injection? #27982
  • dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold -d flag does not work but the full name flag --data-annotations does work #27981
  • Calling Context.Database.Migate() bypasses DbCommandInterceptor on __EFMigrationsHistory table check. #27980
  • Navigation property between two models with "columns in common" without a join/pivot table #27979
  • Add MaxByAsync and MinByAsync #27977
  • GetColumnName() in EF Core 6 returns property name not mapped column name #27968
  • [Required] Used to get generated and be super helpful with MVC validation #27962
  • Does EFCore 6 supports table valued parameters of table valued functions? #27955
  • EF Core returns null for some navigation properties #27952
  • Temporal Tables HIDDEN (INMEMORY ISSUE?) #27949
  • TypeInitialization_Type, Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.EvaluatableExpressionFilter: Could not find property 'Now' on type 'System.DateTimeOffset' when trimmed #27936
  • Scaffolding: Disable skip navigations flag #27930
  • Improve SQL Server query performance by always specifying the schema in table names #27922
  • OnModelCreating(ModelBuilder modelBuilder) is triggered twice by dbContext.Database.EnsureCreated() #27921
  • How to explicitly run model validation as part of a unit test in EF Core 6 #27914
  • Nullability check in in-memory provider does not recognize default value #27913
  • Add support for user defined aggregate window functions #27912
  • EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - extra migrations generated when no change #27911
  • Joining another entity with list navigation property of the queried entity #27909
  • migration " ConcurrencyToken" every time #27908
  • How to stop Entity Framework from including related data automatically #27906
  • could not be translated. Either rewrite the query in a form that can be translated #27905
  • Multiple one-to-one relations in one entity generate differently in migration #27904
  • DbContext Thread Safe #27900
  • ArgumentException on loading database values of object owned by owned object #27899
  • Enabling stricter workflows for destructive migrations #27897
  • EF Core throws Exception when saving changes to objects that were included with `.Include()` #27890
  • Unreliable DateTime comparison in `WHERE` clause #27889
  • Scaffolding option to specify a class suffix #27887
  • DbUpdateException is handled but exception is sent to Azure Application Insight #27885
  • EF is populating available data from Local into nested collection automatically.. can this be turned off? #27883
  • EF Core is closing the connection in async flow #27882
  • Global API to turn off code generation if Table has triggers and optimization in code generation #27879
  • Is this called memory leak ? #27876
  • System.InvalidOperationException: The expression 'r' is invalid inside an 'Include' operation, since it does not represent a property access #27873
  • How to handle DateTime with Unix timestamps in SQLite #27872
  • LINQ expression could not be translated #27870
  • Allow for deferred concurrency check by using token's manually set value rather than value at time of retrieval #27865
